description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Paris FC vs Caen in the Ligue 2
title: Paris FC vs Caen: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Paris FC vs Caen: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Own Goal by Mathys Tourraine, Paris FC. Paris FC 4, Caen 2.
Post
Attempt missed. Kalifa Coulibaly (Caen) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left.
Post
Attempt blocked. Kalifa Coulibaly (Caen) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mathias Autret with a cross.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Omar Sissoko (Paris FC) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Jean-Philippe Krasso following a fast break.
